title: Sienna Miller joins Bruce Springsteen and Robert De Niro for A-list dinner
text:
They all appeared on Friday night's episode of The Graham Norton Show together.

And it looks like Sienna Miller, Bruce Springsteen and Robert De Niro all hit it off as they went for dinner together after their chat show appearance.

Actors Sienna, 37, and Robert, 76, and musician Bruce, 70, went to Sheeky Restaurant in London's Covent Garden on Friday.

Out and abut: Sienna Miller, 37, Bruce Springsteen, 70, and Robert De Niro, 76, all hit it off as they went for dinner together after their chat show appearance

Sienna cut a stylish figure for the evening, donning a mauve jumper underneath a pink t-shirt which she paired with blue, ripped jeans.

The film star also wore black plimsolls with faux-fur trimming while she wrapped up for the evening in a large black coat.

Bruce donned a dark blue and green plaid shirt which he paired with a brown leather jacket and black, slim-fitting jeans and black boots.

Robert wore a dark green shirt which he paired with grey trousers, a black and grey striped scarf and a black coat.

Suave: Bruce donned a dark blue and green plaid shirt which he paired with a brown leather jacket and black, slim-fitting jeans and black boots

Dapper: Robert wore a dark green shirt which he paired with grey trousers, a black and grey striped scarf and a black coat

During her appearance on The Graham Norton Show, Sienna spoke about her role in the mini-series, The Loudest Voice.

The actress transformed into Beth Ailes, the wife of former Fox News CEO Roger Ailes, in the show - which saw her undergo four hours of prosthetics every day.

Sienna detailed how she would get younger beau Lucas Zwirner, 28, to passionately kiss her in the street - while wearing facial prosthetics, leaving tourists 'horrified.'

Asked about playing a character 20 years older than herself, the Layer Cake star said: 'I used to take ‘her’ for walks and into bars. I walked down the street with my quite young-looking boyfriend and asked him to kiss me passionately in front of a crowd of tourists.

Beauty: Sienna looked stunning for her appearance on the chat show where she wore a baby pink dress with a pleated detail and shimmering buttons

Icon: Robert has had a career in the film industry spanning more than fifty years

Legend: Bruce looked in high spirits on the show where he sported a black shirt with a matching blazer and trousers

'They were horrified at the sight of this young boy kissing his nana!'

Earlier this week, Sienna told how she enjoyed the experience of wearing prosthetics because it made both she and co-star Russell Crowe, 55, 'unrecognisable'.

Appearing on This Morning, she said: 'Russell Crowe had a lot [of prosthetics] on. It was a four-hour job, everyday for a long time.

'For the first three days I was laughing a lot, we were completely unrecognisable. But I found it liberating as it's a mask.'

Change: During her appearance on The Graham Norton Show, Sienna spoke about her role in the mini-series, The Loudest Voice, where she played Roger Ailes' wife Beth

The drama charted the executive's career and the allegations of sexual harassment against him.

Ailes was named chairman of Fox News in 2005 and, following his resignation, became an advisor to Donald Trump's presidential campaign where he assisted with debate preparation.

He died in 2017 aged 77 after falling and hitting his head at his home in Palm Beach, Florida.
